thread.title: Zicix Corporation to Acquire Marketing Digest, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: Zicix Corporation to Acquire Marketing Digest, Inc.

organizations.name: zicix corporation to acquire marketing digest, inc

text:
CARSON CITY, Nev., March 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via OTC PR WIRE--(OTC Pink:ZICX) – Zicix Corporation is today announcing finalization of negotiations for the acquisition of Marketing Digest, Inc, a privately held company located in Springfield, NJ.
Marketing Digest, the first acquisition by Zicix Corporation’s new management team, is set to begin test marketing an innovative new application designed to increase shopper convenience in the use of digital coupons.
As year-end results become available, retailers are again reporting that 2017 saw significant increases in the use of digital coupons versus print coupons. With wide spread acceptance of digital coupons, retailers and marketers alike are searching for ways to increase both their availability and ease of use in providing shoppers with access to all available coupons and to maximize the savings which coupons provide.
In making today’s announcement, Zicix President, William Petty said, “I am pleased to announce that test marketing will be underway within a few weeks and that Zicix Corporation will be able to announce an innovative mobile application designed to increase the consumer’s maximum value in obtaining and using digital coupons.”
About Zicix Corporation (OTC Pink:ZICX). Originally founded as a service provider to the Healthcare industry, the Zicix Corporation has recently been restructured with the intention of acquiring and developing technology applications designed for service companies in consumer, retail and other industries.
